knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
con <- dbConnect(drv = RSQLite::SQLite(), "../../Data/GEOmetadb.sqlite")
```


```{r}
dbListTables(con)
```

```{r}
dbListFields(con, "gsm")
```

```{r}
gpl_technology <- dbReadTable(con, "gpl") %>% 
    dplyr::pull(technology) %>% 
    table() %>% 
    sort(decreasing = T) 

gse_type <- dbReadTable(con, "gse") %>% 
    dplyr::pull(type) %>% 
    table() %>% sort(decreasing = T)

gsm_molecule_ch1 <- dbReadTable(con, "gsm") %>% 
    dplyr::pull("molecule_ch1") %>% 
    table() %>% 
    sort(decreasing = T)

gsm_molecule_ch1 %>% head()

dbReadTable(con, "gsm") %>% 
    dplyr::pull("type") %>% 
    tolower() %>% 
    table() %>% 
    sort(decreasing = T) %>% 
    head()
```
